209.customerMessage2: So his Bible is 8 in tall and about 3 in thick

209.customerMessage3: This is the cover that I just got for my Bible but it's too big for his if you have this one in that size that would be amazing

209.AgentMessage3:
ChurchSource: I understand. I'm sorry, but there's no option for a smaller size for the cover that you purchased. Sorry about that. 

The Compass Green Book and Bible Cover can fit most standard-size books and Bibles up to 6-1/8" x 8-13/16": https://churchsource.attn.tv/auzSCNjcIQnC So his bible should be able to fit in it. Let me know if this helps!

210.SystemMessage23: Template used: "My code isn't working"; last updated: 2024-03-01 17:25:18.190
210.AgentMessage1: ELEMIS: Hi, thanks for reaching out. I understand how frustrating that must feel. Just to confirm, have you used the code BDAYW0XEW1TIS? If so, and the issue still persists, we would recommend checking the terms and conditions for eligibility of the products and ensuring you are only using one code. If this continues to still not apply, please let us know which items you are trying to purchase alongside the code for us to assist further.
